exp.desc: At Kanakdristi, I contributed to multiple client-facing and internal web platforms. I developed responsive layouts using Next.js and Nuxt.js, styled with Tailwind CSS, and enhanced user experience with GSAP animations. On the backend, I maintained and extended features in an Express.js application, handled API integrations across admin and client interfaces, and showcased backend proficiency through a NestJS demo project. I also collaborated on a travel CRM, utilizing React (Vite), Zustand, React Query, NestJS APIs, and MUI components, ensuring seamless data handling and scalable UI.
